name: Wasteland
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You grab the earth and infuse it with acid. Any number of spaces you choose erupt with acid, cracking the ground and making it difficult terrain. Creatures on any such space, or who enter a space during their turn, must make a Dexterity saving throw or take 8d10 acid damage, halved on a success.

The acid remains until another spell restores the terrain.
